tool.name: Sum Transient Data
tool.description: Step1 of SimStitch. Sums transient data

param.name: fileList
param.label: List of files (.xml) produced by File List manager

param.name: numscans
param.label: Maximum number of scans for each SIM window

param.name: mintic
param.label: Minimum total ion current (TIC) chromatogram
param.help: Set to 0 to allow all (Default), or threshold as percentage of maximum TIC

param.name: ignorecal
param.label: Discard scans with varying A and B estimates (external calibration)
param.help: uncheck for false (default), check for true)

param.name: maxmz
param.label: Maximum m/z value
param.help: This value can be used to set the maximum m/z value to be included. Set to 0 for automatic estimation.

data.name: output_html
data.label: Sum Transient Data on $fileList.hid: list of output files (.html)
